fullStoryExplanation.title: How Full Story Edit Works
fullStoryExplanation.item1: AI will apply your request to all chapters in the story
fullStoryExplanation.item2: Each chapter edit counts as one edit towards your credit usage
fullStoryExplanation.item3: All successful changes will be automatically saved
fullStoryExplanation.item4: You can review the changes after the edit is complete
fullStoryExplanation.item5: If some chapters fail to edit, the successful ones will still be saved
